name: THE BATTERY ADVOCACY FOR TECHNOLOGY TRANSFORMATION (BATT) COALITION
sampleDescriptions: Incentives for domestic battery materials markets including the Section 45X Advanced Manufacturing Credit and the Section 45W Credit for qualified commercial clean vehicles; Section301 tariff policies; and R&D funding for domestic battery materials.
